name: 莊惠鈞
objective:
本課程之目標為培養學生有能力以英文撰寫不同之基礎學術文體 。課程中強調語法、詞彙及結構之整合，更導入語用學的知識及技巧，以確保寫作之自然及適切性。此外，課程亦將介紹 ChatGPT 等 AI 工具之應用，幫助學生更具效率地學習。

The goal of this course is to develop students' skills in writing academic compositions in different styles/formats. The course will also emphasize grammar, vocabulary, and structure, while introducing pragmatic aspects to ensure natural and appropriate writing. AI tools such as ChatGPT will be integrated to help students learn more effectively.
